laboratory.label: Institute of Biology of Ecole Normale Superieure, Paris, France

laboratory.description: the laboratory where the Strain was isolated, created, or named

substrate.description: the substrate the strain was isolated on

place.description: the place where the strain was isolated

name.description: The name and WormBase internal ID of JU1495

contact.description: the person who built the strain, or who to contact about it

sampled_by.description: the person who sampled the strain

date_received.description: date the strain was received at the CGC

gps_coordinates.description: GPS coordinates of where the strain was isolated

associated_organisms.description: the place where the strain was isolated

made_by.description: the person who built the strain

isolated_by.description: the person who isolated the strain

life_stage.description: the life stage the strain was in when isolated

date_isolated.description: the date the strain was isolated

landscape.description: the general landscape where the strain was isolated

log_size_of_population.description: the log size of the population when isolated
